product_context.title: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: Worked for our new led ceiling lights.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2025
reviews.title: Great buy

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: Switches work fine, but this was a open-box returned item. The box was damaged, one of the switches was missing its wrapper and the instructions were missing. I would have returned them except I needed to use them right away.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2025
reviews.title: Not new. Damaged/missing packing and no instructions.

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: I, like many others bought this because of the price. I am sure you found this switch because of how much cheaper it is compared to other switches that do the same thing. I will be returning this item because it just worries me too much, and that is something I never had to do before. As an electrician I just do not feel comfortable using this product. 1. You can just feel the difference in quality between this switch and any other rocker switch. It weighs close to nothing and feels cheap 2. The rocker switch has no resistance when you push it and feels mushy 3. It doesn’t snap like a normal switch to on/off. You can actually very easily put it in between on/off and that really worries me 4. The switch is only rated to 6amps. I need it to control LED lights and even with LEDs it doesn’t take much to overload that 5. It isn’t UL listed, it is ETL listed but any quality products are almost always UL listed in the US
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2025
reviews.title: You get what you pay for

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: This switch only dims to about 40- 50%. Much less low end than the cheap switch I was using previously. I am also getting lots of fluctuation in the dimming, which I can't be positive is coming from the switch but wasn't happening with the previous switch so it appears to be.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2024
reviews.title: Dimming Range is Very Poor

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: Had to return. They dimmed the lights, but only barely, maybe from 100% to 75%. Not really dim, just a little less than full brightness.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2024
reviews.title: Poor dimming

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: Bought this switch because of the price and I needed 3 of them. It doesn't take up as much room in the J-box as other dimmers, and it is a 0-10v (5 wires to the fixture) design, but it only turned the fixture down about 10%. That wasn't nearly enough. I tried another brand and I got the 75-80% decrease that I needed. So this one works, but not well enough.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2024
reviews.title: Didn't Do what I wanted it to

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: I purchase these switches for use on LED panels and strip lighting for client projects. They are easy to install and the slide function is very smooth. The paddle switch has a good positive feel when switching on and off.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2024
reviews.title: Super Switches

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: I used this switch to create a light wall for my wife. The 0-10 dimmer worked as it should. Easy install and easy to read instructions.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.title: Perfect Switch

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: Ordered 3 packs of two. Out of the 6 switches only 3 worked A 50% failure rate is not acceptable.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.title: Don’t purchase

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.title: good deal

reviews.productTitle: TORCHSTAR 0-10V LED Dimmer Switch, Single-Pole or 3-Way Light Switch, 120-277V for Dimmable LED Panel Light Linear Light, ETL Listed, Pack of 2
reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews, but I feel these dimmers have earned it. I don't know why so many 0-10v dimmers are so expensive, there's not that much going on inside them. These work well and are priced where I would expect them to be. I had the other less expensive ones you see more often, and these are way better for the look, feel and function. These have only one adjustment for minimum brightness, the other brands had adjustments for both min and max.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.title: All around good 0-10v dimmer
